name: Lusófona Games Collection 2023
description:
Lusófona Games Collection 2023 is a selection of four very distinct experiences, ranging from puzzle and exploration games to more action oriented ones. These experiences summarise the diverse work produced by our students, during the different project based classes across the three years of their attendance of the Video Games undergraduate degree.

Featured games:
  • Illuminants - 2018 - First Year
  • Near Side of Yonder - 2020 - Second Year
  • Runewatch - 2022 - Third Year
  • Xisto - 2022 - Third Year

Please be mindful that these game experiences are just small vertical slices that showcase the essential features and gameplay elements, but do not represent finished products.

Hope you enjoy them as much as we do!
